page.title: 17Aston House Stud
page.content: Aston House Stud is owned by Mr and Mrs Chapman. It is a private stud which means that there are d covers 55 acres. The horses eat mainly oats and nuts mixed with molasses. They also have a special feed called "Microfeed". 7 people work at the stud. They take the horses out into the paddocks in the morning and bring them back in the evening,muck out the boxes,creosote and build fences as well as feeding the horses. Mr Chapman has 7 horses in training in England and 6 in Ireland. Most of the brood mares have been in races. The most succesful horses owned by the Chapmans are called Crystal Bright, Infantry Officer and Test of Time.
